text: Yeh log tumharay samney uzur paish keren gay jab tum inn kay pass wapis jaogay. Aap keh dijiye kay yeh uzur paish mat kero hum kabhi tum ko sacha na samjhen gay Allah Taalaa hum ko tumhari khabar dey chuka hai aur aaenda bhi Allah aur uss ka rasool tumhari kaar guzari dekh len gay phir aisay kay pass lotaye jaogay jo posheeda aur zahir sab ka jannay wala hai phir woh tum ko bata dey ga jo kuch tum kertay thay
